name: Europe Villa Cortes

reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel in February at a very traumatic time for my husband and I since my husband's father had just died and we weren't in the mood for joviality, just peace and relaxation.
reviews.title: very pleasant hotel indeed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was beautifully appointed and had a sense of calm and luxury without being stuffy.
reviews.title: Best hotel I have ever stayed in!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was very nice with a separate lounge area and the hugest balcony we have ever had in any hotel we've stayed in anywhere!
reviews.title: Mixed feelings on the Villa Cortes

likes.disliked: — No gym or spa availability and no notice it was not available on website

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: EXCELLENT....still

likes.liked: — The Splendid View From The Balcony, The Cleanliness Of The Bathroom
likes.disliked: — The Hamburger Ordered From Room Service, The Attitude Of The Staff

reviews.title: Great place
reviews.text: Food in the few restaurants the hotel has was good although there are plenty to choose from in the Mare Nostrum area generally so you wont be wondering where to go.

description: 5* Gran Luxe Hotel, located in the south of Tenerife Island, just in front of the Atlantic Ocean, separated from the beach only by the sea promenade. Each of our rooms and suites are exclusively decorated with Mexican elements, which enhances further the personalized environment.Enjoy also our rich gastronomic offer and discover various types of international cuisine like Mexican, Bavarian, European cuisine and much more.
